title: Plow Boy Tobacco Reulbach Cubs Cabinet
author: sb1

posts.post_title: Plow Boy Tobacco Reulbach Cubs Cabinet
posts.post_content:
1910-12 Plow Boy Tobacco cabinet of Ed Reulbach, Chicago Cubs. Very scarce, none graded by PSA and only three by SGC, raw number unknown but far and few between. Has creasing as seen, which is not quite as bad in hand, especially the lower one which blends into the background. The image of Reulbach unaffected by any of the detriments. No pinholes or back damage which is fairly common on these which were often tacked up or glued in a scrapbook.
NO LONGER AVAILABLE
any chance you have an Orval Overall Plow Boy floating around over there?
No Overall dupe at this time.
Reduced to $700.....All Plow Boys are tough, the Cubs are the most popular and Reulbach is a really tough one.
